title: Bug 12428: Confusing Message in Pull Up Refactoring
description: The Pull Up refactoring has a confusing message that needs correction.
OB:
During the Pull Up refactoring, the observed behavior includes:
- The message in the 'Tree of Changes' section under 'Assert' reads: 'Copy method 'void setUp()' to type 'TestCase''. Here, 'TestCase' is shown with the fully qualified name.
EB:
The expected behavior in the Pull Up refactoring should have a clear and correct message:
- The message should read: 'Copy method 'void setUp()' FROM type 'TestCase'' (with an uppercase 'C' in 'Copy').
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Perform the Pull Up refactoring on 'TestCase.setUp' (copies the method to 'Assert').
